WorkItem.Description:
Build default MVVM Light windows 10 universal app.

Runs on Windows 10, no issues.

Download to Raspberry Pi ( running windows 10).  With the exception of the 'Show a Dialog" it all works.

When you click on 'Show a Dialog" the application crashes :(

Comments.Message:
Hi,

I didn't do work with MVVM Light and IOT yet. If you are interested, take a look at the issue and send me  pull request. If not, I will see if I can find a way to look at this issue.

Thanks for reporting
Laurent
